snippet: The first half of the Denver Broncos' playoff game against the Pittsburgh Steelers on Sunday was Tim Tebow's career in a nutshell.
abstract: The first half of the Denver Broncos' playoff game against the Pittsburgh Steelers on Sunday was Tim Tebow's career in a nutshell.
lead_paragraph: The first half of the Denver Broncos' A.F.C. playoff game against the Pittsburgh Steelers on Sunday was Tim Tebow's career in a nutshell. In the first quarter, he couldn't do anything - going three-and-out on two possessions, including one on which Denver actually went backward.

headline.main: Tim Tebow Is No Good. Except for When He's Great.
